antiPatterns.name: Bloated Service
antiPatterns.description: This antipattern describes a service that has one large interface with many parameters performing mostly heterogeneous operation with low cohesion among them.
sources: @inproceedings{palma2015study, title={A study on the taxonomy of service antipatterns}, author={Palma, Francis and Mohay, Naouel}, booktitle={Patterns Promotion and Anti-patterns Prevention (PPAP), 2015 IEEE 2nd Workshop on}, pages={5--8}, year={2015}, doi={10.1109/PPAP.2015.7076848}, organization={IEEE}}
